mineboxadditions.config.autoIsland.desc: Automatically teleports you to your island when joining the server
Displays an alert when the mouse shop is opened
mineboxadditions.config.huds.shop.bakery: Displays an alert when the bakery is opened
mineboxadditions.config.huds.shop.buckst: Displays an alert when the buckstar is opened
mineboxadditions.config.huds.shop.sharko: Displays an alert when the sharkoffe is opened
mineboxadditions.config.huds.haversack.f: Shows the haversack full in hud
Maximum number of item pickup notifications displayed at once
How long each item pickup notification stays on screen
Combine identical items into a single notification instead of showing separate ones
mineboxadditions.config.huds.fishingdrop: Distance around the player within which fishing drops are shown
mineboxadditions.config.items.rarity.mod: Select how item rarity is shown
mineboxadditions.config.items.rarity.opa: Adjust the transparency of the item rarity display
mineboxadditions.config.items.museumIndi: Displays indicator for missing museum items
mineboxadditions.strings.update.title: Update available
mineboxadditions.strings.update.content: A new version of MineboxAdditions is available, some network features may not function anymore in your current version!
mineboxadditions.shiny.notify: 􀀂 All players have been notified. Thank you!
mineboxadditions.shiny.notify.not_exists: 􀀀 The shiny isn't near or is already dead!
mineboxadditions.buckstar.toast: Need a caffeine shot? Buckstar just opened!
mineboxadditions.buckstar.toast.offer: Come and grab your %1$s at the Buckstar Cafe!
mineboxadditions.bakery.toast: Hmmm, what's that smell? The bakery is now open!
mineboxadditions.bakery.toast.offer: The oven is smoking, it smells like %1$s!
mineboxadditions.mouse.toast: The mouse is ready to sell you one of it's finest french cheese! Go and get it!
mineboxadditions.mouse.toast.offer: Wanna have bad breath? The mouse's selling %1$s!
mineboxadditions.sharkoffe.toast: Need a refreshment? The cocktail bar is open!
mineboxadditions.sharkoffe.toast.offer: The bartender is ready to serve you a %1$s!
mineboxadditions.strings.audiochannel.cr: Creation failed! You are already in a voice channel, leave it first!
You have created and joined the voice channel: %1$s. Share this code to other players so they can join your room!
mineboxadditions.strings.audiochannel.jo: There was an error joining voice channel %1$s, it may have expired or does not exist.
You can't create OR join a voice channel with proximity chat enabled, disable it first!
mineboxadditions.strings.audiochannel.us: The player %1$s left the voice channel!
The player %1$s joined the voice channel!
mineboxadditions.strings.audiochannel.le: You are not in a voice channel!
mineboxadditions.strings.audiochannel.pr: The proximity chat is now enabled.
The proximity chat is now disabled.
You can't enable Proximity Chat while being in a voice channel. Leave it first!
mineboxadditions.strings.errors.unauthor: You have not allowed third parties API requests. You can't benefit MineboxAdditions Museum feature. If you want to change that, do /settings and enable API access, then relog to Minebox!
mineboxadditions.strings.errors.missing_: You are missing the Atlas data, you are maybe disconnected from MineboxAdditions server. Try reconnecting to Minebox.
